articles.description: Tess Dolan, eight, could barely contain her excitement when BBC Sport presenter Gabby Logan gifted the young football fan two seats at Wembley during a live TV interview on Thursday.
articles.content:
A young girl who stole the nation's hearts with her celebratory dance moves during the Lionesses' Euro 2022 victory against Sweden has won tickets to the final this Sunday. 
Tess Dolan, eight, could… [+10437 chars]

articles.author: Luke Bissett
articles.title: Darwin Nunez slammed by fans after highlights of Liverpool signing against Salzburg goes viral - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 23-year-old became the Reds' club-record signing after sealing an £85million switch from Benfica. The striker was a success in Portugal as he netted 26 goals in just 28 games last season.
articles.content:
Liverpool striker Darwin Nunez has been mocked on social media following his frustrating display in a 1-0 defeat to Red Bull Salzburg on Wednesday.
The Reds' £85million record signing has become a m… [+3586 chars]
